newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Yeltsin aide likely to meet Lebed on Chechnya -- Tass. [CORRECTED 11:05 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Yeltsin aide likely to meet Lebed on Chechnya -- Tass. [CORRECTED 11:05 GMT]

text.p: Russian President Boris Yeltsin's chief of staff Anatoly Chubais is likely to meet security chief Alexander Lebed on Wednesday to discuss a peace deal Lebed signed with Chechen separatists at the weekend, a Kremlin source told Itar-Tass news agency (Corrects to make clear that Yeltsin is not expected to meet Lebed personally).
